first_commit.message: - fixed and renamed all old blog posts

last_commit.message:
# Staticman implemented with my own instance (_thanks Heroku_)
- added staticman comments
- created my staticman user in GutHub and instance in Heroku
- added support for [Gravatar](https://gravatar.com/) if comment email present
- added more.html include so I don't need to remember hard to pronounce markdown anymore
- bulk replaced old _more_ markdown with new more.html include
